duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the daily financial operations of the local offices and serve as the liaison on fiscal matters between the local, regional, and national offices.
Supervise the Administrative Assistant and ensure that everyone’s personal financial accounts are maintained with financial propriety.
Schedule and conduct house audits monthly and maintain information for each location regarding petty cash accounts, gas and grocery card account information.
Review and process vehicle maintenance requests and maintain records. Ensure routine maintenance is scheduled and performed as needed.
Process PNA invoices received from national, forward to representative payees, and maintain documentation in individuals file.
Train all staff initially upon hire and annually thereafter regarding proper safeguarding of individual funds and petty cash and gas/grocery account procedures.
Retrieve funds, credit cards, receipts, keys, and all property belonging to COI, audits and verifies accounts when a Program Manager or designee maintaining accounts terminates employment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree preferred. 1+ year of related work experience (Accounting). Previous experience as an Office Manager preferred. Working proficiency in Microsoft Suite. Valid Driver's License.
